Class Planet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Point
      • SolarBody
        • Planet

  • public class Planet
extends SolarBody
    This class represents a planet in the SolarSystem. It implements the moves class because it is moving and the HasSatelites, because currently moons orbit it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Planet(java.lang.String n, double dis, double a, double dia, java.lang.String c, double v)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSatelite(Moon m)
      Adds a satelite of type Moon to the ArrayList.
      java.util.ArrayList<Moon> getSatelites()
      Returns the ArrayList containing Moons.
      void move()
      Gives the ability for the planet to move in the solar system, by increasing the angle based on the orbitalVelocity set.

      • Methods inherited from class SolarBody

        getAngle, getColor, getDiameter, getDistance, getName, setAngle, setColor, setDiameter, setDistance, setName

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Planet

        public Planet(java.lang.String n,
              double dis,
              double a,
              double dia,
              java.lang.String c,
              double v)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        n - The name of the Planet.
        dis - The distance of the Planet from the centre of the Universe.
        a - The orbital angle of the Planet.
        dia - The diameter of the Planet.
        c - The color of the Planet.
        v - The orbital velocity of the Planet.

    • Method Detail

      • addSatelite

        public void addSatelite(Moon m)

        Parameters:
        m - The moon.

      • getSatelites

        public java.util.ArrayList<Moon> getSatelites()
        Returns the ArrayList containing Moons.
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing Moons.

      • move

        public void move()
        Gives the ability for the planet to move in the solar system, by increasing the angle based on the orbitalVelocity set.
